timeline.event: Completed the last exam of my BSc in Economics and Computer Science
Submitted my Bachelor's Thesis titled "Exploring Transcriptional Interactions and Language Models for Single Cell RNA-seq Masked Value Prediction" supervised by professor Francesca Buffa
Decided to pursue a career in Machine Learning research after completing a pivotal course in my study plan
Enrolled in a BSc at Bocconi University in Milan
Received my High School Diploma from Liceo Scientifico S. Allende in Milan
Concluded my journey in the "Milano 5" A.G.E.S.C.I. boy-scout group
